author: J. Edward Moreno
title: NJ governor orders all flags across the state be lowered to half-staff indefinitely for lives lost to coronavirus
description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) signed an executive order Friday directing all flags in the state to be lowered to half-staff "indefinitely" in honor of the lives lost during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy (D) signed an executive order Friday directing all flags in the state to be lowered to half-staff indefinitely in honor of the lives lost during the coronavirus pandemic. 
This is one of the greatest tragedies to ever hit our stat… [+1287 chars]
